mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_ID, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_DT FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, CREATE_ID, PHONENUMBER, GENDER, BIRTH_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{createId}, CASE WHEN #{phonenumber} IS NOT NULL THEN #{phonenumber} ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN #{gender} IS NOT NULL THEN #{gender} ELSE NULL END, CASE WHEN #{birthdate} IS NOT NULL THEN #{birthdate, jdbcType=DATE} ELSE NULL END )
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PHONENUMBER = CASE WHEN #{phonenumber} IS NOT NULL THEN #{phonenumber} ELSE PHONENUMBER END, EMAIL = CASE WHEN #{email} IS NOT NULL THEN #{email} ELSE EMAIL END, BIRTH_DATE = CASE WHEN #{birthdate} IS NOT NULL THEN #{birthdate} ELSE BIRTH_DATE END WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE USERS SET DEL_YN = 'Y', UPDATE_ID = CASE WHEN #{updateId} IS NOT NULL THEN #{updateId} ELSE UPDATE_ID END, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
